rule.code:

if (!rvars || !rvars.agg || !rvars.agg.itau_shop || !rvars.agg.itau_shop.last_180_days || rvars.agg.itau_shop.last_180_days.count === null) return false

    return rvars.agg.itau_shop.last_180_days.count < 1
